clusterList.phrase: people who make more are taxed more that's being punished for being more productive and then you're being rewarded for being a parasite if you don't do anything if you're just a bum why you can go on relief you get something for nothing that's a violation of rationality and morality in the short run too the less you do the more you get the more you do the more you're punished that's a fine standard for a culture the most productive people are punished the most for being productive the ones who produce the least are rewarded for being parasites now if i tried to design an irrational structure of a society this is exactly what i'd pick
